title: plz riot listen to us about mord's upcoming "rework"
body:
after i played mord on pbe, i felt angry and frustrated beacus it didnt feel like the mordkaiser i played and loved since i started playing the game. AND I feel that mord beacus of his uniquness is one of the champions that u can   identnify league with.  so for the sake of {{champion:82}}  upvote this so that riot hears our voice.
ps: u can add a reason why u like/dont like the rework that he is having, and maybe an advice to keep mord's identity as a solo tanky mage

replies.body:
I really like the direction of the rework.
For those of you who aren't aware, CertainlyT did attempt to make a bot lane ADC replacement prior to this. {{champion:157}} .
This is essentially Round 2 for CertainlyT. And to stop him from wrecking top lane, he made one of his abilities only work with an ally.
I like everything except the change to his shield. I don't think he should HAVE to be in a duo lane to make use of it.

I'm overall pleased with how the rework is going.  Alot of whats being tested helps make him feel more like a character i can identify with.  His burst will be missed but it is a necessary loss to give my favorite hunk of iron a fresh start.

All hail our Morde and Carry!  Lol
i made  as mistake by voting a like the change, but i dont
